name: Cupric
description:
In Cupric, you play as a sentient plant battling an army of automatons, that cause havoc in your home and community. You must hone your abilities to either fight with the enemies methods as you add metal attachments or fight without corrupting yourself and use organic life as your weapon. The aim of the game is to give the player a challenging build up and a rewarding pay off. The goal of the game is to is to protect your home and community and get rid of all the mad automatons terrorizing your world.

Lead Designer: Tabeeb Choudhury

Tech: Yoeri Pearcey Van Der Beek

Artist: Michael Ward

Music: Tabeeb Choudhury
